name: ublacklist_txt
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stopmodreposts_blocklist.
Tool description: The StopModReposts Blocklist in different data formats.
API description: Fetches the ublacklist.txt data for a specified game using the StopModReposts API.

game.description: The name of the game to fetch the blacklist for. Defaults to 'minecraft'.
